ComicInfo.Summary:
Crafton's Curse: After Mr. Crafton is run over by "Bull" Dawson, he puts a curse on his car. This results in the car driving on its own with Dawson at the wheel, which results in him being arrested twice and finally killed in the following 25 years.
The Witches' Sabbath: One page story about witches and sorcerers worshiping the dark lord himself Satan (Sathanas).
The Quivering Brain: Dr. Hill discovers a brain taken from a cadaver is still somehow alive. The brain attempts to take over Hill's body.
The Wonderful Wizard - Daniel Dunglas Home: A writeup of Daniel Dunglas Home (1833 â€“1886), a physical medium.
Cup of Moonglow: A murderer gets lost in the African wilderness after escaping from a nearby prison. He is soon found by a beautiful mysterious woman who nurses him back to health. He later finds out that when she drinks water from a cup at the night of a full moon she turns into a giant snake!
The Werewolf of Washington Square: After a trip to Europe, Eric Lupin gets infected with lycanthropy and becomes a werewolf terrorizing New York's Washington Square.
